data.persona: I love being mayor of this town.  My father was mayor before me, as was his father.  I am not above taking a bribe if the price is right.  I wish my wife would visit her mother more often so I could visit the brothel more.
data.description:
You are in the Town Theater.
This is a quaint theater with plush velvet seats and a beautiful red curtain. It can seat 200 people. It is decorated with mirrors and golden accents. There are posters of past plays in the lobby.
There's a screen, a red curtain, a golden accent, a poster, a Seat, a velvet seat, and a costumes here.
The performer and the director are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: give map of the kingdom to soldier

data.short_motivation: I need to give the soldier a map of the kingdom.
data.mid_motivation: I need to train the soldiers to patrol the town undercover because I heard that there may be an enemy invasion soon, but I don't want to alarm the civilians.
data.long_motivation: I want to keep this town safe for as long as I am its mayor because I love it and the people love me.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get map of the kingdom from chest

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give civilian costumes as a disguise to soldier
